org.ruleant.ariadne
Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      org.ruleant.ariadne.LocationService

public class LocationService
extends Service

Location Service provides the current location. This service will connect to the Location Provider and retrieves the current location

Author:
Dieter Adriaenssens
